Anthracnose.remedy: Use fungicides and practice crop rotation.
Anthracnose.details: Ensure proper spacing between plants and remove infected plants.

Apple Scab.details: Prune and destroy infected leaves and branches.

Black Spot.remedy: Remove and destroy affected leaves and apply fungicides.
Black Spot.details: Ensure good air circulation and avoid overhead watering.

Blight.remedy: Remove infected plants and apply copper-based fungicides.
Blight.details: Avoid wetting the foliage and plant resistant varieties.

Blossom End Rot.remedy: Maintain consistent soil moisture and add calcium to the soil.
Blossom End Rot.details: Avoid root damage and provide proper mulching.

Botrytis.remedy: Remove affected plant parts and apply fungicides.
Botrytis.details: Ensure good air circulation and avoid high humidity.

Brown Rot.remedy: Apply fungicides and remove mummified fruits.
Brown Rot.details: Prune to increase air circulation and remove infected branches.

Canker.remedy: Remove infected branches and apply fungicidal sprays.
Canker.details: Improve tree vigor through proper fertilization and watering.

Cedar Apple Rust.remedy: Remove nearby cedar trees and apply fungicides.
Cedar Apple Rust.details: Plant resistant varieties and prune affected areas.

Clubroot.remedy: Improve soil drainage and raise soil pH by adding lime.
Clubroot.details: Practice crop rotation and avoid infested soil.

Crown Gall.remedy: Remove and destroy infected plants and avoid wounding plants.
Crown Gall.details: Disinfect pruning tools and use resistant plant varieties.

Downy Mildew.remedy: Apply appropriate fungicides and remove affected leaves.
Downy Mildew.details: Ensure good air circulation and avoid overhead watering.

Fire Blight.remedy: Prune infected branches and apply bactericides.
Fire Blight.details: Avoid excessive nitrogen fertilization and disinfect tools.

Fusarium.remedy: Remove and destroy affected plants and use fungicides.
Fusarium.details: Practice crop rotation and avoid overwatering.

Gray Mold.remedy: Remove infected plant parts and apply fungicides.
Gray Mold.details: Ensure good air circulation and avoid overcrowding plants.

Leaf Spots.remedy: Remove affected leaves and apply fungicides.
Leaf Spots.details: Water plants at the base and improve air circulation.

Mosaic Virus.remedy: Remove infected plants and control insect vectors.
Mosaic Virus.details: Plant resistant varieties and avoid using infected tools.

Nematodes.remedy: Use nematode-resistant plant varieties and solarize soil.
Nematodes.details: Practice crop rotation and improve soil organic matter.

Powdery Mildew.remedy: Apply fungicides and remove affected leaves.
Powdery Mildew.details: Ensure good air circulation and avoid overhead watering.

Verticillium.remedy: Remove and destroy affected plants and improve soil drainage.
Verticillium.details: Plant resistant varieties and avoid overwatering.
